SELECT A.BIN_CounterInfoID AS counterInfoId, A.BIN_OrganizationID AS organizationId, A.BIN_BrandInfoID AS brandInfoId, A.CounterCode AS counterCode, A.Status AS status, A.CounterAddress AS counterAddress, A.CounterCategory AS counterCategory, A.ValidFlag AS validFlag, A.PosFlag AS posFlag, A.BelongFaction AS belongFaction, A.OperateMode AS operateMode, A.InvoiceCompany AS invoiceCompany, A.EmployeeNum AS employeeNum, convert(varchar(30),A.UpdateTime,121) AS updateTime, A.ModifyCount AS modifyCount, F.EmployeeCode AS employeeCode, B.OrgSynergyFlag AS counterSynergyFlag, A.BusniessPrincipal AS busniessPrincipal, A.EquipmentCode AS equipmentCode, A.ManagingType2 AS managingType2,
A.NameForeign AS counterNameIF, C.BrandNameForeign AS brandNameChinese, D.ChannelNameForeign AS channelName, F.EmployeeNameForeign AS employeeName, X.RegionNameForeign AS region, Y.RegionNameForeign AS province, Z.RegionNameForeign AS city, H.ResellerName AS resellerName, G.NameForeign AS resellerDepartName
A.CounterNameIF AS counterNameIF, C.BrandNameChinese AS brandNameChinese, D.ChannelName AS channelName, F.EmployeeName AS employeeName, X.RegionNameChinese AS region, Y.RegionNameChinese AS province, Z.RegionNameChinese AS city, H.ResellerName AS resellerName, G.DepartName AS resellerDepartName
A.CounterNameIF AS counterNameIF, C.BrandNameChinese AS brandNameChinese, D.ChannelName AS channelName, F.EmployeeName AS employeeName, X.RegionNameChinese AS region, Y.RegionNameChinese AS province, Z.RegionNameChinese AS city, H.ResellerName AS resellerName, G.DepartName AS resellerDepartName
FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo A JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization B ON A.BIN_OrganizationID = B.BIN_OrganizationID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_BrandInfo C ON A.BIN_BrandInfoID = C.BIN_BrandInfoID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Channel D ON A.BIN_ChannelID = D.BIN_ChannelID LEFT JOIN Privilege.BIN_EmployeeDepart E JOIN Basis.BIN_Employee F ON E.BIN_EmployeeID = F.BIN_EmployeeID AND F.ValidFlag = '1' ON B.BIN_OrganizationID = E.BIN_OrganizationID AND E.ManageType = '1' LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Region X ON B.BIN_RegionID = X.BIN_RegionID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Region Y ON B.BIN_ProvinceID = Y.BIN_RegionID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Region Z ON B.BIN_CityID = Z.BIN_RegionID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_ResellerInfo H ON A.BIN_ResellerInfoID = H.BIN_ResellerInfoID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization G ON A.ResellerDepartID = G.BIN_OrganizationID
JOIN () A99 ON B.BIN_OrganizationID=A99.BIN_OrganizationID
WHERE A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId#
A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#
A.CounterCode LIKE '%'+#counterCode#+'%'
A.CounterNameIF LIKE '%'+#counterNameIF#+'%'
A.BIN_ChannelID = #channelId#
A.Status = #status#
A.CounterAddress LIKE '%'+#counterAddress#+'%'
A.ValidFlag = '1'
B.BIN_ProvinceID = #provinceId#
B.BIN_CityID = #cityId#
F.EmployeeNameForeign LIKE '%' + #counterBAS# + '%'
F.EmployeeName LIKE '%' + #counterBAS# + '%'
F.EmployeeName LIKE '%' + #counterBAS# + '%'
A.BusniessPrincipal LIKE '%' + #busniessPrincipal# + '%'

SELECT A.BIN_RegionID AS regionId,
MAX(CASE WHEN B.RegionType = '0' THEN B.RegionNameForeign END) AS region, MAX(CASE WHEN B.RegionType = '1' THEN B.RegionNameForeign END) AS province, MAX(CASE WHEN B.RegionType = '2' OR B.RegionType = '3' THEN B.RegionNameForeign END) AS city
MAX(CASE WHEN B.RegionType = '0' THEN B.RegionNameChinese END) AS region, MAX(CASE WHEN B.RegionType = '1' THEN B.RegionNameChinese END) AS province, MAX(CASE WHEN B.RegionType = '2' OR B.RegionType = '3' THEN B.RegionNameChinese END) AS city
MAX(CASE WHEN B.RegionType = '0' THEN B.RegionNameChinese END) AS region, MAX(CASE WHEN B.RegionType = '1' THEN B.RegionNameChinese END) AS province, MAX(CASE WHEN B.RegionType = '2' OR B.RegionType = '3' THEN B.RegionNameChinese END) AS city
FROM Basis.BIN_Region A JOIN Basis.BIN_Region B ON A.NodeID.IsDescendantOf(B.NodeID) = 1 WHERE A.BIN_RegionID IN
#counterList[].regionId#
GROUP BY A.BIN_RegionID

SELECT C.BrandCode, A.CounterCode, A.CounterNameIF, A.CounterNameShort, A.NameForeign, A.NameShortForeign, A.CounterAddress, A.DisCounterCode, A.CounterSpace, A.CounterKind, A.CounterCategory, A.CounterLevel, A.Status, A.UpdateStatus, A.InvoiceCompany, A.OperateMode,
A.PosFlag, A.BelongFaction, Mall.MallName, A.BusDistrict, A.longitude, A.latitude, A.EquipmentCode, A.ManagingType2,
K.RegionNameForeign AS region, L.RegionNameForeign AS province, M.RegionNameForeign AS city, N.RegionNameForeign AS county, F.EmployeeNameForeign AS employeeName, D.ChannelNameForeign AS channelName, H.ResellerName AS resellerName, G.NameForeign AS resellerDepartName
K.RegionNameChinese AS region, L.RegionNameChinese AS province, M.RegionNameChinese AS city, N.RegionNameChinese AS county, F.EmployeeName AS employeeName, D.ChannelName AS channelName, H.ResellerName AS resellerName, G.DepartName AS resellerDepartName
K.RegionNameChinese AS region, L.RegionNameChinese AS province, M.RegionNameChinese AS city, N.RegionNameChinese AS county, F.EmployeeName AS employeeName, D.ChannelName AS channelName, H.ResellerName AS resellerName, G.DepartName AS resellerDepartName
FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo A JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization B ON A.BIN_OrganizationID = B.BIN_OrganizationID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_BrandInfo C ON A.BIN_BrandInfoID = C.BIN_BrandInfoID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Channel D ON A.BIN_ChannelID = D.BIN_ChannelID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Region K ON B.BIN_RegionID = K.BIN_RegionID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Region L ON B.BIN_ProvinceID = L.BIN_RegionID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Region M ON B.BIN_CityID = M.BIN_RegionID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Region N ON B.BIN_CountyID = N.BIN_RegionID LEFT JOIN Privilege.BIN_EmployeeDepart E JOIN Basis.BIN_Employee F ON E.BIN_EmployeeID = F.BIN_EmployeeID AND F.ValidFlag = '1' ON B.BIN_OrganizationID = E.BIN_OrganizationID AND E.ManageType = '1' LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_ResellerInfo H ON A.BIN_ResellerInfoID = H.BIN_ResellerInfoID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization G ON A.ResellerDepartID = G.BIN_OrganizationID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_MallInfo Mall ON A.BIN_MallInfoID = Mall.BIN_MallInfoID
JOIN () A99 ON B.BIN_OrganizationID=A99.BIN_OrganizationID
WHERE A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId#
A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#
A.CounterCode LIKE '%'+#counterCode#+'%'
A.CounterNameIF LIKE '%'+#counterNameIF#+'%'
A.BIN_ChannelID = #channelId#
A.Status = #status#
A.CounterAddress LIKE '%'+#counterAddress#+'%'
A.ValidFlag = '1'
B.BIN_ProvinceID = #provinceId#
B.BIN_CityID = #cityId#

SELECT TOP $number$ A.BIN_EmployeeID AS id, A.EmployeeCode AS code,
A.EmployeeNameForeign AS name
A.EmployeeName AS name
A.EmployeeName AS name
FROM Basis.BIN_Employee A LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization B ON (A.BIN_OrganizationID = B.BIN_OrganizationID AND B.ValidFlag = '1') LEFT JOIN Privilege.BIN_PositionCategory C ON (A.BIN_PositionCategoryID = C.BIN_PositionCategoryID AND C.ValidFlag = '1')
JOIN () A99 ON A.BIN_EmployeeID=A99.BIN_SubEmployeeID
WHERE A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.ValidFlag = '1'
(A.BIN_BrandInfoID=#brandInfoId# OR A.BIN_BrandInfoID='-9999')
(A.EmployeeCode LIKE '%' + #counterBAS# + '%'
A.EmployeeNameForeign LIKE '%' + #counterBAS# + '%'
A.EmployeeName LIKE '%' + #counterBAS# + '%'
A.EmployeeName LIKE '%' + #counterBAS# + '%'
)
